examples: Social workers operate on the razor’s edge.
We study the history of our country in social studies class.
You can also get information on careers in social work from their website.
Mark's reputation as a love rat spread quickly among his social circle, as he had a long history of cheating on his partners.
She was always into sports and social activities, while I was your typical bookworm with very few friends.
words.defineEn: related to society and its citizens' lives in general
words.defineVi: liên quan đến xã hội và cuộc sống của công dân nói chung

examples: "Sorry, I've run out."
Sorry, I'm still really groggy.
Sorry, what did you say?
Sorry, I don't follow.
Sorry, could you please hand me the book?
words.defineEn: feeling ashamed or sad about something that one has or has not done
words.defineVi: cảm thấy xấu hổ hoặc buồn về điều gì đó mà một người đã hoặc chưa làm

examples: Every day about noon, traffic in town grinds to a halt.
to control the traffic congestion
You can hear the traffic from your room day and night.
Priority is given to traffic already on the roundabout.
The new traffic system worked up to a point, but it had its problems.
words.defineEn: the coming and going of cars, airplanes, etc. in an area at a particular time
words.defineVi: sự đến và đi của ô tô, máy bay, v.v. trong một khu vực vào một thời điểm cụ thể

examples: Morning brought no relief from the heat.
The morning is a time of new beginnings and possibilities.
My mother waters the plants in our garden every morning.
I had a letter from my brother this morning.
I got a call from Dave this morning.
words.defineEn: the time of day that is between when the sun starts to rise and the middle of the day at twelve o'clock
words.defineVi: thời gian trong ngày là giữa khi mặt trời bắt đầu mọc và giữa ngày lúc mười hai giờ

examples: The team's new manager brings ten years' experience to the job.
The new loan takes the total debt to $100 000.
The new president takes office in January.
Fans have given the band's new song their seal of approval.
The organization called the new regulations a turning point in the campaign against smoking.
words.defineEn: recently built, invented, made, etc.
words.defineVi: được xây dựng, phát minh, chế tạo gần đây, v.v.

examples: The farm sits in the shadow of Ben Nevis.
Candidates will sit the examinations in June.
She sits her horse gracefully.
A large bus was sitting outside.
The new policy sits well with the company's values.
words.defineEn: to be in or on a chair or seat, or on the ground, resting our weight on our bottom with a straight back
words.defineVi: ở trong hoặc trên ghế hoặc ghế ngồi, hoặc trên mặt đất, dồn trọng lượng của chúng ta xuống mông với lưng thẳng

examples: Bad weather brought chaos to the utility companies.
Bad luck often brings good luck.
The bad weather brought famine.
Don’t use bad language.
Bad manners will get you nowhere.
words.defineEn: having a standard or quality that is unsatisfying
words.defineVi: có tiêu chuẩn hoặc chất lượng không thỏa mãn

examples: The food looks good.
Good wine can make a meal.
Bad luck often brings good luck.
This information is as good as gold.
"Your guess is as good as mine."
words.defineEn: having a standard or quality that is satisfying
words.defineVi: có tiêu chuẩn hoặc chất lượng thỏa mãn

examples: Lots of couples have problems in the first year of marriage.
The problem has now reached crisis point.
The problem was always at the back of my mind.
There are problems.
The problem is all in his head.
words.defineEn: something that causes difficulties and is hard to overcome
words.defineVi: một cái gì đó gây ra khó khăn và khó vượt qua

examples: The driver of the car opened the car door for the passengers.
The waiter opened the bottle of wine for the guests.
The library opens at 10 o'clock on weekdays.
right on cue the door opened
The store stays open late on Thursdays.
words.defineEn: (of a door or window) to become open so that people, things, etc. can pass through
words.defineVi: (của cửa ra vào hoặc cửa sổ) trở nên mở để mọi người, đồ vật, v.v. có thể đi qua

examples: For children, picture books provide a window onto the world.
The closed window blocked out the noise from the street.
The photographs clearly show a broken window.
Two faces appeared at our window.
Language is a window into the world.
words.defineEn: a space in a wall or vehicle that is made of glass and we use to look outside or get some fresh air
words.defineVi: một không gian trong một bức tường hoặc chiếc xe được làm bằng kính và chúng tôi sử dụng để nhìn ra bên ngoài hoặc hít thở không khí trong lành

examples: The water feels warm.
Are you warm enough?
It's quite warm outside.
The afternoon sun casts a warm glow on the buildings and trees.
The season of summer brings warm weather and longer days.
words.defineEn: having a temperature that is high but not hot, especially in a way that is enjoyable and pleasant
words.defineVi: có nhiệt độ cao nhưng không nóng, đặc biệt là theo cách thú vị và dễ chịu

examples: Most characters in his movies are somewhat larger than life.
A large crowd watched the game on Saturday.
He left a large estate.
A large bus was sitting outside.
The truck delivered a large shipment of goods to the warehouse.
words.defineEn: big or above average in amount or size
words.defineVi: lớn hoặc trên trung bình về số lượng hoặc kích thước

examples: The weather was disagreeably hot.
The news came hot on the heels of another plane crash.
The factory closure follows hot on the heels of several others
The winter issue is hot off the press.
That hot guy had a good head on his shoulders.
words.defineEn: having a high temperature or a high degree of heat
words.defineVi: có nhiệt độ cao hoặc nhiệt độ cao

examples: Today is Monday.
The lawyers put another nail in her coffin today.
The euro hit a record low in trading today.
I saw a famous actress at the shopping mall today.
All winter coats are half-price today.
words.defineEn: the day that is taking place right now
words.defineVi: ngày đang diễn ra ngay bây giờ

examples: Teachers should read more poetry to children.
Teachers are up in arms about new school tests.
Better ask teacher about.
The teacher placed the books on the desk.
The teacher called out our names one by one for attendance.
words.defineEn: someone who teaches things to people, particularly in a school
words.defineVi: một người dạy mọi thứ cho mọi người, đặc biệt là trong một trường học

examples: My father is quite old now
This thankless IT support job is really getting old.
This old house gives me the willies.
The old man gave up the ghost.
The old man considered his granddaughter thoughtfully.
words.defineEn: of a particular or specified age
words.defineVi: của một độ tuổi cụ thể hoặc quy định

examples: He wants to become bilingual and speak multiple languages fluently.
My channel is turning bilingual.
Bilingual people get Strooped in both languages they speak.
And Junior is my bilingual student.
In fact, a lot of babies from bilingual families grow up fluent in both languages.
words.defineEn: describing the ability to speak, understand, or use two languages fluently
words.defineVi: mô tả khả năng nói, hiểu hoặc sử dụng hai ngôn ngữ trôi chảy

examples: She moved her queen.
Things certainly move fast in the blogosphere.
She moved the tray to a side table.
We moved our chairs a little nearer.
She moved the ball toward the opponent's goal.
words.defineEn: to go from one place to another; to change position
words.defineVi: đi từ nơi này đến nơi khác; để thay đổi vị trí

examples: The bag broke under the weight of the bottles inside it.
My friend shared a bag of chocolate-covered macadamia nuts with us.
She put her bag on the table.
I left my bag downstairs in the entryway.
Each 180-litre container will hold up to three black bags of rubbish.
words.defineEn: something made of leather, cloth, plastic, or paper that we use to carry things in, particularly when we are traveling or shopping
words.defineVi: thứ gì đó làm bằng da, vải, nhựa hoặc giấy mà chúng ta dùng để đựng đồ, đặc biệt khi chúng ta đi du lịch hoặc mua sắm

examples: Schools have welcomed such arrangements with open arms.
The school took the full force of the explosion.
She left school at 16.
Many schools don’t take full advantage of the Internet.
The kids always work hard at school.
words.defineEn: a place where children learn things from teachers
words.defineVi: một nơi mà trẻ em học những điều từ giáo viên
